summary: Having reached the lowest point in his life, a self-destructive man on the brink of demise receives an unexpected call from his estranged sister to look after her young daughter for the night. Could this be the beginning of a new reality?
cast: Shawn Christensen|Fatima Ptacek|Kim Allen|Dana Segal|Kirsten Holly Smith|Helga Athineos|Gino Patti|Emily Grace Buck|karen Elizabeth v Eilbacher|Mark Register
title: Curfew
